reviews.review_msg: Rambles during lectures and the information he provides is hard to retain. 80% of the class stopped attending lectures. I went to every lecture and didn't retain much information or take any quality notes. I relied heavily on my T.A. Matt gave no indication of what was going to be on the final exam. Not a caring professor and hard to meet with.

Worst prof ive ever had, is terribly boring and the structure of his lecture slides is confusing and doesn't make much sense. Only a final exam no midterm, but gave absolutely no indications of what the structure of the final would be. Rambles, talks slow, monotone voice, limited/useless lecture slides. Wish he was not a professor at SFU.
